== Pangarappilly (627751) ==

Pangarappilly is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 812 hectares and harbouring 1333 households with total population of 5467 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Shoranur]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 2598 and female population is 2869. Scheduled Caste Population is 534 and Scheduled Tribes population is 72. Census Location Code of the village is 627751<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
